SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery

Class UserPanelUITest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.UserPanelUITest
public class UserPanelUITest extends Object
UI Tests for UserPanel Tests User Story 01.02.03: User can view their events and manage invitations Updated to work around Espresso InputManager compatibility issues Uses direct view access instead of Espresso's onView() for better compatibility

    Description
    void
    setUp()
    Sets up the test environment before each test Initializes Espresso Intents for intent verification

    tearDown()
    Cleans up after each test Releases Espresso Intents and closes any open scenarios
    void
    testBothEventTypesDisplay()
    Test that both registered and waitlisted events can be displayed USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that the updated display logic shows both types of events correctly
    void

    Test that edit icon is visible and clickable USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies the edit profile icon is accessible to users

    Test that UserPanel properly cleans up listener on destroy USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that the real-time listener is removed when activity is destroyed
    void

    Test that loading indicator is shown initially USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that users see a loading message while data is being fetched
    void

    Test that CardView elements have proper modern styling USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies the new modern card-based UI is displayed

    void

    Test navigation to EditUserInfoActivity USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that clicking the edit icon launches the EditUserInfoActivity
    void
    testNoDuplicateEvents()
    Test that events are not duplicated in the display USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies the bug fix where waitlisted events that are also registered are only shown once with their registered status
    void
    testOnResumeRefresh()
    Test that UserPanel handles onResume correctly with real-time listener USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that returning to UserPanel maintains real-time updates
    void

    Test that registered events title is displayed USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies the "My Events" header is shown
    void

    Test that user name view exists and is visible USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies the user's name is displayed at the top of the panel
    void
    testUserPanelLaunches()
    Test that UserPanel launches successfully and displays user name USER STORY 01.02.03 Verifies that the user's profile information is loaded and displayed
